docs.snippet: The Mets’ Matt Harvey has had a way of keeping fans on the edge of their seats, wondering if he would throw a no-hitter. Now, they are left wondering if he will be back....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Matt Harvey has had a way of keeping fans on the edge of their seats, wondering if he would throw a no-hitter. Now, they are left wondering if he will be back.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on New York Mets injured pitcher Matt Harvey, who was expected to lead the team back atop the National League East and beyond; holds so many things can break down for a pitcher, in a game and in his body, that nothing is ever assured.

docs.abstract: Toronto Blue Jays defeat New York Yankees, 5-2, to spoil Yankees star shortstop Derek Jeter's return to the team; Jeter believes recent muscle injuries that forced him to return to the disabled list on three separate occasions are an indirect result of broken ankle he sustained in Oct 2012 in Game 1 of the American League Championship Series.
